name: Alpi Aviation SA CC
about: Alpi Aviation SA, established in 2007, is a premier flying school dedicated to providing professional flight training with a strong emphasis on safety. Led by Dale de Klerk, an accomplished aviation expert and enthusiast, the school is certified to CAA and RAASA standards. Dale's extensive experience includes being a world Rally Flying Champion and earning Springbok Flying colours in Rally and Precision flying. Alpi Aviation values the individuality of each student, using experienced instructors to hone their capabilities and enhance their passion for flying. With a personal and hands-on approach, Alpi Aviation aims to take your flying career to new heights, ensuring no one is "just another student pilot."
